review: I took my father to Dr Raju's clinic who required dentures . We are very happy with the quality of the dentures . Dr Raju is very knowledgeable and has finesse in his hands . I am very happy with him. I would highly recommend him .
I had seviour pain in my back tooth...visited many doctors before him BT pain didn't fall down at last Dr Raju sharma nailed it in only two sittings.
